title: Person
description: A person who can be assigned to an event.

id.description: The unique id of this person, autogenerated in the database.

firstName.description: The first name of the person.

middleName.description: The optional middle name of the person.

lastName.description: The last name of the person

phone.description: The phone number of the person with only 10 digits and no punctuation or spaces.

email.description: The email address of the person.

updateUser.description: The username of the person who last updated this person.

updateDttm.description: Epoch timestamp (number of seconds from 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) for when the person was updated.
